Communication

Our main internal communication channels are:

  • Discord.
  • Telegram.
  • Board of trust - meetings scrum every week.
  • Whatsap.

Where we store info:

  • GitHub - a github personal account for shared code and, well, the muLabsDAO DNA that you are reading right now.

How we communicate with the outside world:

  • muArts site - https://muarts.tech/
  • Twitter - our twitter handle is @muLabsDAO
  • Facebook muArts
  • â€¦ but the biggest channel of communication is of course the personal and informal channels - tweeting, blogging, and talking with everybody. Together we have a huge network!
